StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateO.cerMissingDocuments]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MissingDocID integer, @ContractID integer, @DateEntered date.me, @Comments varchar(256), @Level varchar(16), @Assigned varchar(16), @DueDate date.me, @Status varchar(16), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF @MissingDocID < 1 BEGIN INSERT INTO [MISSING_DOCUMENTS] (CONTRACT_ID, DATE_ENTERED, COMMENTS, [LEVEL], ASSIGNED, DUE_DATE, STATUS, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ContractID, @DateEntered, @Comments, @Level, @Assigned, @DueDate, @Status, @UserLogin, getdate()) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [MISSING_DOCUMENTS] SET [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID, [DATE_ENTERED] = @DateEntered, [COMMENTS] = @Comments, [LEVEL] = @Level, [ASSIGNED] = @Assigned, [DUE_DATE] = @DueDate, [STATUS] = @Status, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = getdate() WHERE [MISSING_DOC_ID] = @MissingDocID; END
